description: This file defines API routes for managing chess games in a backend of a chess platform, including creating games, making moves, retrieving game details, and leaderboards.

methods.name: get_leaderboard(db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = 10)
methods.description: Provides a leaderboard of top players.

start_game(request: GameStartRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
